long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MSSQL, Oracle, MySQL

No additional components are required in the machine. You get a UI with support for remote management, and many more features. Allows you to manage both local and remote database from your machine.
